entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 09 January 2023
